item.title: Elite bull market takes control again with the S&P 500 touching 6,800 for first time ever
item.description: The phase of the current bull market that pushed off the blocks six months ago is proving elite at refreshing itself with the briefest of respites.

item.title: Starboard aims to unlock the value of Fluor's investment in nuclear tech company NuScale
item.description: Activist investor Starboard sees a chance to unlock the value of Fluor's 39% stake in NuScale Power, a developer of small modular nuclear reactors.

item.title: GM is overbought and AT&T is oversold after an active week of trading off earnings
item.description: CNBC Pro screened the S&P 500 for the most overbought and oversold stocks this past week, using their 14-day relative strength index, or RSI.

item.title: Bank of America names five stocks with more room to run before they report earnings
item.description: Bank of America says buy these five stocks before it's too late.

item.title: Musk calls proxy advisory firms 'corporate terrorists.' Why their power is growing in the stock market
item.description: What to know about the proxy advisors that hold sway over shareholder voting.
